list.quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
list.author: Nelson Mandela

list.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
list.author: Walt Disney

list.quote: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
list.author: Steve Jobs

list.quote: If life were predictable it would cease to be life, and be without flavor.
list.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

list.quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
list.author: John Lennon

list.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
list.author: Winston Churchill

list.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
list.author: Steve Jobs

list.quote: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
list.author: Abraham Lincoln

list.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
list.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

list.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
list.author: Theodore Roosevelt

list.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
list.author: Confucius

list.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
list.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

list.quote: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do.
list.author: Steve Jobs

list.quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
list.author: Sam Levenson

list.quote: The best revenge is massive success.
list.author: Frank Sinatra

list.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
list.author: Wayne Gretzky

list.quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
list.author: Thomas A. Edison

list.quote: It's not whether you get knocked down, it's whether you get up.
list.author: Vince Lombardi

list.quote: You can never cross the ocean until you have the courage to lose sight of the shore.
list.author: Christopher Columbus

list.quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
list.author: Peter Drucker

list.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
list.author: Mark Twain

list.quote: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
list.author: Albert Einstein

list.quote: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
list.author: Charles R. Swindoll

list.quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
list.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

list.quote: The Pessimist Sees Difficulty In Every Opportunity. The Optimist Sees Opportunity In Every Difficulty.
list.author: Winston Churchill

list.quote: Don't Let Yesterday Take Up Too Much Of Today.
list.author: Will Rogers

list.quote: You Are Never Too Old To Set Another Goal Or To Dream A New Dream.
list.author: C.S. Lewis

list.quote: The Man Who Has Confidence In Himself Gains The Confidence Of Others.
list.author: Hasidic Proverb

list.quote: Believe In Yourself And All That You Are. Know That There Is Something Inside You That Is Greater Than Any Obstacle.
list.author: Christian D. Larson

list.quote: We May Encounter Many Defeats But We Must Not Be Defeated.
list.author: Maya Angelou

list.quote: Knowing Is Not Enough; We Must Apply. Wishing Is Not Enough; We Must Do.
list.author: Johann Wolfgang Von Goethe

list.quote: Imagine Your Life Is Perfect In Every Respect; What Would It Look Like?
list.author: Brian Tracy

list.quote: We Generate Fears While We Sit. We Overcome Them By Action.
list.author: Dr. Henry Link

list.quote: Whether You Think You Can Or Think You Can’t, You’re Right.
list.author: Henry Ford

list.quote: Security Is Mostly A Superstition. Life Is Either A Daring Adventure Or Nothing.
list.author: Helen Keller

list.quote: The Only Limit To Our Realization Of Tomorrow Will Be Our Doubts Of Today.
list.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

list.quote: Creativity Is Intelligence Having Fun.
list.author: Albert Einstein

list.quote: What You Lack In Talent Can Be Made Up With Desire, Hustle And Giving 110% All The Time.
list.author: Don Zimmer

list.quote: Do What You Can With All You Have, Wherever You Are.
list.author: Theodore Roosevelt

list.quote: Develop An Attitude Of Gratitude. Say Thank You To Everyone You Meet For Everything They Do For You.
list.author: Brian Tracy

list.quote: You Are Never Too Old To Set Another Goal Or To Dream A New Dream.
list.author: C.S. Lewis

list.quote: To See What Is Right And Not Do It Is A Lack Of Courage.
list.author: Confucius

list.quote: Reading Is To The Mind, As Exercise Is To The Body.
list.author: Brian Tracy

list.quote: Fake It Until You Make It! Act As If You Had All The Confidence You Require Until It Becomes Your Reality.
list.author: Brian Tracy

list.quote: The Future Belongs To The Competent. Get Good, Get Better, Be The Best!
list.author: Brian Tracy

list.quote: For Every Reason It’s Not Possible, There Are Hundreds Of People Who Have Faced The Same Circumstances And Succeeded.
list.author: Jack Canfield

list.quote: Things Work Out Best For Those Who Make The Best Of How Things Work Out.
list.author: John Wooden

list.quote: A Room Without Books Is Like A Body Without A Soul.
list.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

list.quote: I Think Goals Should Never Be Easy, They Should Force You To Work, Even If They Are Uncomfortable At The Time.
list.author: Michael Phelps

list.quote: One Of The Lessons That I Grew Up With Was To Always Stay True To Yourself And Never Let What Somebody Else Says Distract You From Your Goals.
list.author: Michelle Obama

list.quote: Today’s Accomplishments Were Yesterday’s Impossibilities.
list.author: Robert H. Schuller

list.quote: The Only Way To Do Great Work Is To Love What You Do.
list.author: Steve Jobs

list.quote: The Only Limit To Our Realization Of Tomorrow Will Be Our Doubts Of Today.
list.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

list.quote: You Don’t Have To Be Great To Start, But You Have To Start To Be Great.
list.author: Zig Ziglar

list.quote: The Best Time To Plant A Tree Was 20 Years Ago. The Second Best Time Is Now.
list.author: Chinese Proverb

list.quote: The Only Place Where Success Comes Before Work Is In The Dictionary.
list.author: Vidal Sassoon

list.quote: The Way Get Started Is To Quit Talking And Begin Doing.
list.author: Walt Disney

list.quote: Success Is Not Final, Failure Is Not Fatal: It Is The Courage To Continue That Counts.
list.author: Winston Churchill

list.quote: You Are Never Too Old To Set Another Goal Or To Dream A New Dream.
list.author: C.S. Lewis

list.quote: The Only Limit To Our Realization Of Tomorrow Will Be Our Doubts Of Today.
list.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

list.quote: Success Is Not The Key To Happiness. Happiness Is The Key To Success. If You Love What You Are Doing, You Will Be Successful.
list.author: Albert Schweitzer

list.quote: The Best Way To Predict The Future Is To Create It.
list.author: Peter Drucker

list.quote: Don’t Let Yesterday Take Up Too Much Of Today.
list.author: Will Rogers

list.quote: You Are Never Too Old To Set Another Goal Or To Dream A New Dream.
list.author: C.S. Lewis

list.quote: The Future Belongs To Those Who Believe In The Beauty Of Their Dreams.
list.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

list.quote: Do Not Let Yesterday’s Failures Ruin The Beauty Of Today, Because Each Day Has Its Own Promise Of Love, Joy, And Forgiveness.
list.author: Unknown

list.author: Zig Ziglar
